name: Zipper Amusement Ride
description:
Now you are able to control the classic an iconic Midway ride „Zipper“

Watch how visitors buy tickets, control the whole amusement ride and choose your lighting and sound effects – or simply sit yourself in one of the gondolas and experience your very own ride! On day or at night - you decide!

FEATURES
• Control one of the most fascinating rides that can be found on the fairgrounds
• Comprehensive simulated fairground
• Interacting people
• High quality graphics in HD
• Realistic physics
• Playable Jingles
